persistence-unit.name: mpadminPU
persistence-unit.description:
Main persistence unit, all entity classes are detected by spring while doing the component scanning via the PersistenceAnnotationBeanPostProcessor
If you want to exclude specific classes you will need to set them manually and specify <exclude-unlisted-classes /> Example : <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthGroup</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthGroupPermissions</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthMessage</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthPermission</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthUser</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthUserGroups</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.AuthUserUserPermissions</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.DjangoAdminLog</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.DjangoContentType</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.DjangoSession</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.DjangoSite</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdChangePassword</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdCity</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdComment</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdCountry</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdMake</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdMakeModel</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdMakeSubmodel</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdMetro</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdOrder</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdPage</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdPermission</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdPicture</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProduct</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProductBrand</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProductModel</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProductShipment</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProductSubmodel</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdProductSupplier</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdRequestCarPart</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdRole</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdShipmentVendor</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdState</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdSubmodelYearMapping</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdTag</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdTagGrp</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdTagGrpTagMapping</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdTagRelation</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdTopic</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserActivity</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserActivityEvent</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserAddress</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserAuth</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserDetail</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdUserTagPreference</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TdVote</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TempTdSubmodelYearMapping</class> <class>com.app.mpadmin.domain.TempTdTagGrpTagMapping</class> <exclude-unlisted-classes />
